description: Gohma Mites had extremely weak wills and were utterly dependent on the Hive in order to function. Some Amplifiers could maintain their Mite Cluster's functions for a time after their own death.
tooltip: Gohma Mites had extremely weak wills and were utterly dependent on the Hive in order to function. Some Amplifiers could maintain their Mite Cluster's functions for a time after their own death. (Hive Amplifiers now spawn an uncontrollable Mite Cluster on death, a swarm of Mites that can continue to attack)
